page.description: Allows you to search for a value in all tables.
page.discussion: The SearchTables() function displays the Search Selected Tables for Data Value dialog box. This dialog allows you to discover the names of the tables and of their fields that contain a specified value.

section.description: In the example illustrated below, the dialog found that the phrase "Cali Pressureless Racquetballs" was found in the Description field of the New_Products and Product tables. To find tables and fields:

item.description: Enter the value into the Value to search for control.
Select the data type of the value from the Data type of search value list. The options are:

item.name: "Time"
item.description: for fields that have both date and time values

item.name: "Date"
item.description: for fields that have only date values

item.name: "Short time"
item.description: for fields that have only time values
Close Close to exit the dialog box.
